name: Colin McRae: Dirt
summary: The mobile version of DiRT is a racing game played from a behind view. It contains a career mode as well as a rally world section which consists of quick races, challenges and exhibitions. The main part of the game is the career mode where the player if successful unlocks new cars to be used in the rally world section. The career mode involves completing tracks in successive order. Each track involves competing against three opposing drivers in a best of three laps race. By winning the race a new track and a new car is unlocked.
